521 
523  bool try_put( const T& t ) {
524  task *res = try_put_task(t);
525  if (!res) return false;
526  if (res != SUCCESSFULLY_ENQUEUED) internal::spawn_in_graph_arena(graph_reference(), *res);
527  return true;
528  }
529
